directions: Mix together the cilantro, tomatoes, red onion, jalapeno, tomatillos, lime juice, hot chili sauce and cumin seed in a large bowl. Season with salt to taste.
Cover and refrigerate overnight before serving to blend flavors. Serve with tortilla chips.
ingredients: 1 teaspoon hot chili sauce (such as Sriracha) (optional)
title: Pittsburgh Football Party Cilantro Salsa
